body:
Theodore,

You need to have matching surfaces in order to get good heat flow across them.  You want to use the intersect masses component to help you with this:

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cDvBWDA0aF0&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW...](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cDvBWDA0aF0&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_&index=10)

-Chris
